page_content:
Mission Builder

Version:MissionOS_2.0

Mission Builder provides the ability to add supplementary data types to the Mission Site framework and manage ground conditions, quantities, QA/QC testing and other spatial and job-related metadata.

A data summariser is also under development to unlock powerful analytics. Fees are quoted on a per project basis and are a function of project size, complexity and risk.

 

 

Mission Builder as the name suggests adds technical data layers onto the job hierarchy in Mission Site. Each data layer is particular to each type of construction and allows businesses to standardise and control the way in which data is captured and recorded.

Data layers include:

  • General construction (concrete, steel etc)
  • Drill and Blast Tunnelling
  • TBM Tunnelling
  • Mined Tunnelling
  • Retained Excavations
  • Earthworks (Cut and Fill)
  • Reclamation
  • Piling and foundations
